title: Country Places
description: This book informs students about the types of things located in the country. Students will learn about all of these places and their purposes. Detailed, supportive illustrations and repetitive phrases support early readers.
meta: city, corral, country, farmhouse, orchard, shed
Use the reading strategy of connecting to prior knowledge to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /f/ sound
Punctuation : Recognize and use question marks
High-Frequency Words : Recognize and use high-frequency word this

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
